member.name: T:Test.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Test.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Test.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: F:Test.cFITSReader.HeaderBlockSize
member.summary: Length of a header block - FITS files may contain an integer size of header blocks.

member.name: F:Test.cFITSReader.HeaderElements
member.summary: Number of header elements per header block.

member.name: P:Test.cFITSReader.DataStartIdx
member.summary: 0-based index of the first image data within the file.

member.name: M:Test.cFITSReader.ReadIn(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Double[0:,0:]@)
member.summary: Read FITS data from the passed file.
member.param: File name to load FITS data from.
Use the BZERO and BSCALE value within the file for scaling - if OFF omit the data.
Loaded image data processed by BZERO and BSCALE - if PointsToRead is passed, the matrix is 1xN where N is the number of entries in PointsToRead.

member.name: M:Test.cFITSReader.ReadIn(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Double[0:,0:]@,System.Drawing.Point[])
member.summary: Read FITS data from the passed file.
member.param: File name to load FITS data from.
Use the BZERO and BSCALE value within the file for scaling - if OFF omit the data.
Loaded image data processed by BZERO and BSCALE - if PointsToRead is passed, the matrix is 1xN where N is the number of entries in PointsToRead.
Vector of points to read on - pass an empty vector to read all values and generate a matrix for ImageData.

member.name: M:Test.cFITSReader.FixSample(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Drawing.Point}@,System.Int16[])
member.summary: Change entries in the passed FileName FIT file.
member.param: List of points to be modified.
